memories.summary: On January 3, 2025, in Ann Arbor, Liam trained at the gym, lifting weights while wearing headphones.
On February 15, 2025, in Chicago, Liam played basketball with friends on an indoor court, caught mid-jump shot.
On March 22, 2025, in Boston, Liam ran along the Charles River with his running club, bundled up against the chilly wind.
On April 14, 2025, in New York, Liam joined teammates at a soccer match, captured celebrating a goal on the field.
On May 19, 2025, in Denver, Liam hiked with his cousin Julia, standing at a mountain overlook with wide views.
On June 10, 2025, in Seattle, Liam joined a cycling group, riding along the waterfront on a clear morning.
On July 7, 2025, in Toronto, Liam competed in a summer triathlon, running toward the finish line in his race bib.
On September 3, 2025, in Austin, Liam played tennis with Sophia, shaking hands at the net after the match.
On October 12, 2025, in San Francisco, Liam joined friends for a marathon, crossing the Golden Gate Bridge with the crowd.
On December 28, 2025, in Miami, Liam relaxed after a beach volleyball game, sitting with teammates in the sand at sunset.

qa_pairs.question: Which sports did Liam play competitively versus casually?
qa_pairs.answer_gold: Competitively: soccer, triathlon, marathon. Casually: basketball, tennis, volleyball, cycling.

qa_pairs.question: What outdoor activities show Liam's love for nature?
qa_pairs.answer_gold: Hiking in Denver, cycling in Seattle, triathlon in Toronto, marathon in San Francisco, and beach volleyball in Miami.

qa_pairs.question: Which friends joined Liam in different sports?
qa_pairs.answer_gold: Noah and David in basketball, Sophia in running and tennis, Omar and Raj in soccer, Julia on a hike, Rachel in cycling, Maya and Noah in a marathon, and Raj again in volleyball.

qa_pairs.question: Which international trip involved competition, and what event was it?
Which memory best reflects a festive sports atmosphere?
qa_pairs.answer_gold: The beach volleyball game in Miami with teammates at sunset.
